thread.title: Representative Ryan says his statement declining to run for House speaker stands
thread.title_full: Representative Ryan says his statement declining to run for House speaker stands | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Representative Ryan says his statement declining to run for House speaker stands
text:
WASHINGTON Republican Representative Paul Ryan said on Thursday a previous statement he had made declining to run for House of Representatives speaker still stands after the front-runner dropped out of the race.
"My statement stands, I haven't changed anything. I've got nothing to add right now," Ryan, chairman of the House Ways and Means Committee, told reporters after Kevin McCarthy, the No. 2 House Republican, unexpectedly ended his bid for speaker.
(Reporting by Susan Cornwell ; Writing by Eric Beech ; Editing by Eric Walsh )
